Detailed Description

A class which has instance variables required to canonically and uniquely identify a Browfile.

Conforms to NSCoding and NSCopying so that it can be archived in Core Data stores using the default transformer.

The five string instance variables must consist of only the characters allowed in filenames.

Member Function Documentation

+ (Browid *) browidWithStridentifier: (NSString*)  stridentifier  

Returns a browid made from decoding a stridentifier.  Untested!!

I wrote this method for use in allBrowfilesForWebAppsThisUser but then didn't use it, deciding that it was easier to iterate through available browfiles.  This method has never been tested!

- (NSString *) homePath  

Returns the home path of the Macintosh account in which the receiver's bookmarks reside, if it has a non-nil otherMacAccount.  Otherwise, returns the current user's home directory.

Returns:
The full path in one of two forms,
  • "/Volumes/VolumeName/Users/aUserShortName"
  • "/Volumes/aUserShortName"
The first form will be returned if otherMacVolume is non-nil the second form will be returned if it is nil.

- (BOOL) isEqualToBrowid: (Browid*)  otherBrowid  

Compares the receiver's six instance variables with those of another browid and returns YES if all are equal, including nil==nil.

Returns:
If all are not equal, including nil==nil, returns NO.

+ (NSDictionary *) otherMacIdentifierPartsWithVolumesPath: (NSString*)  path  

Given the path of a file or folder, extracts the values of the constKeyIdentifierOtherMacAccount and constKeyIdentifierOtherMacVolume keys and returns them in a dictionary.

Parameters:
path A path to some file or folder in a Home directory on another Macintosh account, in one of these two forms:
  • "/Volumes/VolumeName/Users/aUserShortName/Additional/Components/Ignored"
  • "/Volumes/aUserShortName/Additional/Components/Ignored"
If a value cannot be extracted from the path, no key is set for it in the result.
Returns:
A dictionary containing neither, one, or both of the keys constKeyIdentifierOtherMacAccount, constKeyIdentifierOtherMacVolume.

- (NSString *) stridentifier  

A string which uniquely identifies the receiver and all of its instance variables.

May be used as a filename.
